text: The Bob Newhart Show is an American sitcom that aired on CBS. It ran between 16 September, 1972 and 1 April, 1978. It starred Bob Newhart, Suzanne Pleshette, Bill Daily, Peter Bonerz, Marcia Wallace, Larry Gelman, Teri Garr. ==Other websites== * * The Bob Newhart Show at TVGuide.com Category:1972 American television series debuts Category:1978 American television series endings Category:1970s American sitcoms Category:CBS network shows Category:English-language television programs
title: The Bob Newhart Show
